-- The length of @points@ should be @COMPSIZE(target)@.


glGetSharpenTexFuncSGIS :: MonadIO m => GLenum -> Ptr GLfloat -> m ()

glGetSharpenTexFuncSGISFunPtr :: FunPtr (GLenum -> Ptr GLfloat -> IO ())
